byline.contributor: Chris Buckley contributed reporting from Hong Kong.
byline.original: By JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS and CORAL DAVENPORT

abstract: Obama administration announces that Chinese Pres Xi Jinping will present plan to limit and put a price on greenhouse gas emissions beginning in 2017; Xi will announce the deployment of what is known as a cap-and-trade system during upcoming White House summit meeting with Pres Obama.
lead_paragraph: China will announce a landmark commitment on Friday to limit and put a price on greenhouse gas emissions, a substantial step by the world’s largest polluter.

headline.main: China to Announce Cap-and-Trade Program to Limit Emissions
headline.print_headline: U.S. Says China Will Announce Cap-and-Trade Emissions Plan

snippet: China will announce a landmark commitment on Friday to limit and put a price on greenhouse gas emissions, a substantial step by the world’s largest polluter.

keywords.value: Carbon Caps and Emissions Trading Programs
keywords.name: subject
